snippet: The country said it would commit an additional 5 billion euros to helping needy municipalities.
abstract: Germany announces commitment of an additional 5 billion euros to aid country's troubled municipalities, adding to 10 billion euro, or $11.2 billion, investment plan.
lead_paragraph: The country said it would commit an additional 5 billion euros to helping needy municipalities.

headline.main: Germany to Bolster Investment in Cities and Towns
headline.print_headline: Germany Adds to Fund for Needy Communities
